title: Muthialpet declared containment zone after man tests positive for COVID19

content: All roads leading to Kottakuppam on the East Coast Road (ECR) in Villupuram district from Muthialpet, situated near the inter-State border in Puducherry here, have been sealed as part of the precautionary measures after a person from Kottakuppam tested positi… [+874 chars]
